0.8.2.name: wordpress/apple-news-rumors-reviews
0.8.2.description: The widget is meant for anyone who wants to show the latest Apple news, rumors and/or reviews without actually having to write the articles. The widget can be configured to show only news & rumors, only reviews or both news & rumors and reviews. You will also be able to specify how many items you want to show, what the title should be and have full control of the list's formatting.
